footer.description: Modern solution for property management and rental services

main.mainText1: Rent Pult - effective rental property management system
main.mainText2: Rent Pult service helps property owners and managers control their real estate
main.mainText4: For each property in the Rent Pult system, a shared information space is created between all owners, trusted representatives, and tenants. Here you can track rental payment history, utility meter readings, manage photo reports, maintain furniture and equipment inventory, set reminders, and record all operational features of the property.
main.title: Rent Pult
main.feature1Text: With Rent Pult, you have complete control over your property, even when you're in another city.
main.feature2Text: Rent Pult provides a secure and reliable platform for managing your property.
main.feature3Text: Comprehensive solution for property management considering the interests of all parties: owners, managers, and tenants.
main.step1Text: Enter information about your real estate and configure management and access parameters.
main.step2Text: Grant access to trusted representatives for effective management of your property.
main.step3Text: Monitor payments, utilities, and property condition from anywhere in the world.
main.testimonial1: Thanks to Rent Pult, I can control my 5 apartments while being in another city. All information is always at hand, and the notification system ensures I don't miss important events.
main.testimonial2: As a property manager, I appreciate the convenience of the system. Now all communication with owners and tenants is structured and transparent.
main.testimonial3: The system helped my husband and me organize the management of our investment properties. Now we know exactly the profitability of each property and can plan further investments.
main.readyToStart: Ready to effectively manage your property?
main.ctaText: Join thousands of satisfied owners and managers right now!
main.faq1Question: How do I register on the platform?
main.faq1Answer: Registration on our platform is simple and takes just a few minutes. Click the 'Register' button, fill in the required fields, and confirm your email.
main.faq2Question: How many properties can I add to the system?
main.faq2Answer: You can add an unlimited number of properties. The system allows you to effectively manage both a single apartment and an entire real estate portfolio.
main.faq3Question: How do I assign a manager for my property?
main.faq3Answer: In the 'Property Information' section, you can specify the ID of trusted individuals who will receive management rights. They will be able to perform most property management functions but cannot distribute access rights.
main.faq4Question: Can tenants enter information into the system?
main.faq4Answer: Yes, tenants can enter meter readings, payment information, and participate in communication through chat. This creates a transparent interaction system for all parties.
main.mobileAppText: Manage your property wherever you are with our convenient mobile application.
main.newsletterText: Subscribe to our newsletter to be the first to learn about new system capabilities and property management tips.
main.privacyNote: We respect your privacy and will never share your data with third parties.

auth.getStarted: Sign in or register to get started
